name: GreedPit
author: Naym
description:
"As
 our engines, born of steam and cog, grew both in complexity and output,
 so did our primordial greed for gold. Mind ablaze, we sought wealth in 
the subterranean bellies of our mechanical cities: amid pipes and 
petrol, we had lost all control -but couldn’t and wouldn’t care. Our 
bodies were machines; our minds shine-seekers."
